resources.description: Used for buying units, structures, research, and anything else.
Used for production. Higher amounts of Celestium allow for quicker production of units, structures, research, and anything else.

Each unit requires a population space, new units can be promoted from the remaining population space. If there are more units than the amount of supported population space, all units will start receiving double damage from all sources.
resources.negativeIncomeDescription: Caution, there are more units than the supported population.

resources.description: Maximum amount of storage for all melee, ranged and special weapons. The most valuable weapons are lost if the maximum storage is decreased for any reason.
Weapon used for promotion of units with melee qualities.
Weapon used for promotion of units with ranged qualities.
Weapon used for promotion of units with special qualities.
Each point of Faith provides +1 Initiative to all owned units. Faith is generated by Temples.

structures.description: Hut brings Scraps income and should be built on top of Scraps resources.
Obelisk provides Celestium income and should be built on top of Celestium resources
Shack houses Population needed for new unit production.
Smith works on Melee Weapon production.
Fletcher works on Ranged Weapon production.
Alchemy works on Special Weapon production.
Depot provides storage to all Weapons.
Workshop can be used to research various upgrades.
Outpost can be climbed and used as a tower.
Barricade helps to defend against ranged attacks and acts as an obstacle for melee units.

doodads.description: Any unit in this area is contaminated: has its vision and Attack Distance reduced by 3 (total minimum of 1) and receives 1 Pure Damage at the start of its turn.
The cargo which is attached to Pyre leaves a path of flames when moved, which stay until the start of the next Pyre's action or until death.
Any unit which starts its turn or moves onto the flames receives 5 Melee Damage.
This tile will receive massive damage on the next Cannon's turn. Until then, Cannon's owner has vision of this tile.
These tiles are revealed for Radar's owner until the start of the next planning phase.
This red dot shows where enemy unit is currently located inside the fog of war.
Provides +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour to all friendly units until the start of Vessel's action.
50% of all damage done to this rendition will be done as Pure Damage to the original target.

abilities.description: Provides 3 Scraps and 7 Celestium at the start of each planning phase.
At the start of each planning phase provides 5 Scraps.
At the start of each planning phase provides 5 Celestium (-2 for each subsequently constructed Obelisk, total minimum of 1).
UEE faction loses if Battery Core is destroyed.
Start building a UEE's structure in vision on a tile with Power. Collector and Extractor can be built on tiles without Power.
All abilities get disabled and loses 5 Health at the start of its action or action phase if not connected to Power.
Provides 4 Population and 4 spaces of storage for Weapons.
Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.
Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.
Promote a new Revelators goon from the remaining Population.
Heals all nearby units in 5 Attack Distance by 5 Health. Adjacent units are healed by 15 Health instead and their vision, Melee and Ranged Armour are all reduced by 3 for 3 actions.
Provides 2 Population
Every 20 Celestium generates a Melee Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.
Every 25 Celestium generates a Ranged Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.
Every 30 Celestium generates a Special Weapon and either stores it to an empty Weapon space or waits until there is a free space available.
Provides 4 spaces of storage for Weapons which are used for new unit production.

selection.name: research-revelators-humanflesh-rations
selection.description: Unlock Leap Of Hunger for Mummy.

abilities.description: Open a selection of research available for Revelators to unlock.
Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.
Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.
Every unit adjacent to the shield of this Barricade receives +2 Range Armour.
Every unit adjacent to the spikes of this Barricade receives 5 Pure Damage at the start of each action phase.

abilities.deactivationDescription: Toggle to stop inflicting 15 Pure Damage to itself at the start of each action phase.
abilities.description: Toggle to start inflicting 15 Pure Damage to itself at the start of each action phase.
Provides Power in 4 Distance.
Upgrade this Battery Core to Fusion Core.
Provides Power in 6 Distance.
Select an enemy unit in 6 Distance. At the start of the action phase the target receives 3 ranged attacks, each dealing 3 Range Damage.
Upgrade this Fusion Core to Celestium Core.
Provides Power in 8 Distance.
Select an enemy unit in 8 Distance. At the start of the action phase the target receives 4 ranged attacks, each dealing 4 Range Damage.
Unlocks Improved Power Grid ability for all Power Poles.
Provides +2 Scraps at the start of each planning phase if connected to Power.
Gains additional 3 Melee Armour if connected to Power.
Provides Power in 4 Distance.
Regenerates +1 Shields to units and structures in 4 Distance at the start of each planning phase.
Distance of provided Power and shield regeneration is increased to 6.
Provides Power in 6 Distance.
Regenerates +1 Shields to units and structures in 6 Distance at the start of each planning phase.
Provides +2 Movement to friendly units in 6 Distance at the start of each action phase. Additionally provides +1 Faith. Each point of Faith increases the Initiative of all owned units by 1.
Select a unit to be created at the specified location using Celestium for production.
Select a unit to be created at the specified location using Celestium for production.
Select a unit to be created at the specified location using Celestium for production.
Open a selection of research available for UEE to unlock.
Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.
Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.
Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.
Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.
Allows movement through for friendly units and blocks it for enemy units.
Provides +2 vision range, +1 Attack Distance and +1 Range Damage to ranged units on top.
Provides +1 Range Armour, +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance to all units on top.
Revelators faction loses if Leader dies.
All friendly and enemy units that enter 6 Attack Distance around Leader have their Melee Damage and Ranged Damage reduced by 2 (total minimum of 1).
Select an adjacent Obelisk and sap its energy to give all friendly units +2 Health. This Obelisk cannot be sapped again for 10 turns.

Start building a Revelators' structure on an adjacent tile. Multiple Slaves can build the structure, each additional one after the first provides half of the Celestium production to the construction than the previous Slave.
Select an adjacent structure. At the start of the next planning phase the selected structure receives +1 Health. Multiple Slaves can stack their repairs. Repair can be interrupted.
Select an adjacent Hut. At the start of the next planning phase receive +2 Scraps. Maximum of one Slave per Hut.
Ranged attacks twice.

Each ranged attack cripples the target until the end of their action. During this time target has 60% of their maximum Movement (rounded up) and cannot receive healing from any sources. Multiple attacks on a crippled target have no additional effects.
Either as an action, or instead of attacking, or upon getting killed Gorger detonates, dealing its Melee Damage to all friendly and enemy units in 1 Attack Distance, killing itself in the process.

Deals 50% of target's lost Health as bonus Melee Damage if there are no friendly units around Camou in 4 Attack Distance. Additionally, if the target has none of its allies in the same radius, Camou silences the target for 2 of its actions, disabling the use of any abilities or passives.

Select an adjacent unoccupied space on a high ground. This space is considered occupied until the end of the action phase at which point Camou moves to it. Passively, Camou can move down from high ground at the additional cost of 1 Movement.

Select a tile in 4 Attack Distance, which gets contaminated. Any unit in the contamination has its vision and Attack Distance reduced by 3 (total minimum of 1) and receives 1 Pure Damage at the start of its turn. At the end of this action phase, the contamination area expands to adjacent tiles and stays until the end of the next action phase.
The cargo leaves a path of flames when moved, which stay until the start of the next Pyre's action or until death. Any unit which starts its turn or moves onto the flames receives 5 Melee Damage.
Can move through enemy units (but not buildings).

Select a direction (1 out of 4) originating from Big Bad Bull. Any two adjacent units towards the selected direction suffer Bull's Melee Damage and are pushed one tile farther. If the destination tile is occupied or impassable, the target receives additional 5 Melee Damage.
Select an adjacent tile in which Roach is created.
Roach creation range is increased to 4 Distance.
Select a tile in 4 Distance in which Roach is created.
At the start of each action loses 1 Health more than the previous action.
Perform a ranged attack in 4 Distance dealing 6 (+8 to mechanical) Range Damage.

Instead of attacking, Parasite attaches to the target. Both units occupy the same space and are considered enemy to all players. Parasite can only detach when the target is killed. All units who attack this combined unit do damage to both. On its turn, Parasite can move the target, using target's Movement. On target's turn, it must execute attack action to any friendly or enemy unit in range, otherwise skip turn.
Gains +2 Range Armour if at least one other Horrior is adjacent.
Spend 3 turns mounting (unable to act) and at the start of the fourth planning phase transform into Surfer.

Each ranged attack marks the target unit. If a friendly non-Marksman unit attacks the marked target, the mark is consumed and the target receives 5 Melee Damage. The mark lasts until the end of the next action phase.
Upon death, reemerges as Horrior.
Each ranged attack consumes 1 ammo out of 2 total. Cannot range attack when out of ammo. Each ranged attack deals full Ranged Damage to all adjacent units around the target.
Spend this action phase reloading to full ammo.
Ranged Armour from the main target is ignored when attacking with Deadly Ammunition.
Gains +3 Vision range.
Selected ranged adjacent friendly unit gains +1 Attack Distance. The bonus is lost at the end of the target's next action, or if the targeted unit is no longer adjacent.
Restores 1 Health to all adjacent friendly units at the start of each planning phase.

Start building a Machine on an adjacent tile. Multiple Engineers can build the Machine, up to a number needed to operate the Machine. Each Engineer provides current Celestium production to the construction.
Select an adjacent Machine and start operating it if the Machine is built and does not have the maximum number of operating Engineers already.

Select an adjacent structure, Machine or Horrior. At the start of the next planning phase the selected structure or Machine receives +2 Health and selected Horrior's mounting time is decreased by 1 turn. Multiple Engineers can stack their repairs. Repair can be interrupted.
Can be built and operated by Engineers only. The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 3 Engineers are operating it.

Instead of a regular ranged attack, select any tile in Attack Distance. This tile is revealed for allies and highlighted as dangerous for enemies. Instead of the next Cannon's action, the attack is triggered which deals massive Range Damage.
Can be built and operated by Engineers only. The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 1 Engineer is operating it.
Can only be built on a Watchtower or Bastion.

Spends 1 action aiming, when attacking a new target. A dotted line to the target indicates aiming. The target can stop this process if it moves out of Ballista's Attack Distance. Once aimed, same target can be attacked each action.
Can be built and operated by Engineers only. The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 1 Engineer is operating it.
Selected tile in 15 Attack Distance and all adjacent tiles are revealed until the start of the next planning phase.
Enemy units in 15 Attack Distance are shown as red dots in the fog of war.
Can be operated by Engineers only (after it is built from Factory). The Machine is functional and can act only if maximum number of 3 Engineers are operating it.
Reduces Melee and Range damage done by 50% to all friendly units in 3 Attack Distance, which is instead dealt to Vessel.
Provide +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour to all friendly units in 3 Attack Distance until the start of the next Vessel's action.

Place a ghostly rendition of a selected enemy unit in 7 Attack Distance to an unoccupied space in a 3 Attack Distance from the selected target. The rendition has the same amount of Health, Melee and Range Armour as the selected target, cannot act, can be attacked and stays for 2 action phases or until the selected target is dead. 50% of all damage done to the rendition is done as Pure Damage to the selected target. If the rendition is destroyed before disappearing, the selected target emits a blast which deals 10 Melee Damage and slows all adjacent enemies by 50% until the end of their next action.
Select an unoccupied space in a 3 Attack Distance to place the rendition of the selected target.

This building can only be placed on the low ground and can be built by multiple Slaves simultaneously. The placement can include a maximum of 2 marsh tiles.
This unit receives double damage from all sources, because there's not enough population space.
This building can only be placed on the low ground tiles with Power. Cannot be placed on marsh tiles.

If this unit is not connected to Power, all abilities get disabled and it loses 5 Health at the start of its action or action phase.
All abilities are disabled because Power is not supplied.

Provides 4 spaces of storage for Weapons.
Can be navigated through to go up to high ground.
Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.
Range Armour for this unit is increased by 2 because of a nearby Barricade's shield.
This Barricade is decomposing and will receive 15 Pure Damage at the start of each action phase.
Provides Power in 4 Distance.
This building can only be placed on the low ground Scraps tiles.
This building can only be placed on the low ground Celestium tiles.
This building can only be placed on the low ground tiles with Power.

Provides +2 Scraps at the start of each planning phase because it's connected to Power.

Gains additional 3 Melee Armour because it's connected to Power.

Provides 1 Faith. Each point of Faith increases the Initiative of all of this player units.

Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.

Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +2 vision range, +1 Attack Distance and +1 Range Damage for their ranged attacks.
Unit is on a Watchtower and has +2 vision range, +1 Attack Distance and +1 Range Damage for ranged attacks.
Provides an area of high ground to other units, who all gain +1 Range Armour, +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for their ranged attacks.
Unit is on a Bastion and has +1 Range Armour in addition to the default high ground bonus: +1 vision range and +1 Attack Distance for the ranged attacks.
Revelators faction loses when this unit dies.
Melee and Range Damage for this unit is reduced by 2.
This unit has recently been sapped for health.
Heals for 2 Health.
This building can only be placed on the low ground Scraps tiles, and can be built by multiple Slaves simultaneously.
This building can only be placed on the low ground Celestium tiles, and can be built by multiple Slaves simultaneously.
This structure will be repaired by +1 Health at the start of the planning phase.
Currently repairing a structure.
Slave is working on this Hut to provide +2 Scraps at the start of the planning phase.
Currently working on a nearby Hut.
Ranged attacks twice.
This unit has only 60% of their maximum Movement (rounded up) and cannot receive healing from any sources until the end of its action.
Upon getting killed or executing a melee attack Gorger explodes dealing its Melee Damage to all friendly and enemy units in 1 Distance.
This unit is silenced (use of any abilities is disabled).
Camou will complete climbing on an adjacent high ground space at the end of this action phase.
Camou can move down from high ground at the additional cost of 1 Movement.
Effect area will expand at the end of this action phase.
Effect area will disappear at the end of this action phase.
Unit has its vision and Attack Distance reduced by 3 (total minimum of 1) and receives 1 Pure Damage at the start of its turn, at which point the effect ends.
The cargo follows Pyre.
The cargo leaves a path of flames when moved, which stay until the start of the next Pyre's action or until death. Any unit which starts its turn or moves onto the flames receives 5 Melee Damage.
Pyre can move through enemy units (but not buildings).
Increases periodic damage by 1 at the start of each action.
This unit will continue to receive 1 damage at every start of its action.
This unit is possessed by Parasite. On Parasite turn, it moves both units using the movement speed that the possessed unit has. Any damage received is shared between both.
This unit is possessed by Parasite. On its turn, the possessed unit controls the attack which it must do unless there are no legal targets.
Parasite has possessed the unit on top, gaining its movement speed and the ability to move both units on Parasite's turn.
Range Armour for this unit is increased by 2 because it is in formation with an adjacent Horrior.
This unit is mounting up to transform into Surfer.
Marksman has marked this target until the end of the next action phase. The mark is consumed dealing 5 Melee Damage, when an ally of Marksman attacks this unit.
Upon death, reemerges as Horrior.
Each ranged attack consumes 1 ammo out of 2 total. Cannot range attack when out of ammo. Each ranged attack deals full Ranged Damage to all adjacent units around the target.
Mortar will reload its ammunition at the end of this action.
Ranged Armour from the main target is ignored when attacking with Deadly Ammunition.
Gains +3 Vision range.
Gains +1 Attack Distance range from nearby Hawk. Bonus will be lost at the end of the next action or if Hawk is not adjacent anymore.
Restores 1 Health to all adjacent friendly units at the start of each planning phase.
Heals for 1 Health.
This machine can only be placed on the low ground and can be assembled by a maximum of 3 Engineers at once.
This machine can only be placed on a Watchtower or Bastion and can be assembled by a maximum of 1 Engineer at once.
This machine can only be placed on the low ground and can be assembled by a maximum of 1 Engineer at once.
This structure or machine will be repaired by +2 Health at the start of the planning phase.
This Horrior will have their Mount duration reduced by one turn at the start of the planning phase.
Currently repairing.
Needs 3 Engineers to operate this machine.
This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.
This tile will receive massive damage on the next Cannon's turn. Until then, Cannon's owner has vision of this tile.
This Cannon is heating up for a blast at the danger zone.
Needs 1 Engineer to operate this machine.
This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.
This unit is aimed by a Ballista, which allows it to shoot every turn as long as this unit remains in range.
Needs 1 Engineer to operate this machine.
This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.
Provides vision to the Radar's owner.
This red dot is able to detect enemy units in the fog of war.
Needs 3 Engineers to operate this machine.
This machine is disabled until it is fully operated by the required number of Engineers.
The melee and ranged damage this unit receives is reduced by 50%, but this amount is also dealt to a nearby Vessel.
Provides +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour to all friendly units until the start of Vessel's action.
Has +3 Melee Armour and +3 Range Armour due to a nearby fortified Vessel
This unit is about to have its rendition placed in a 3 Attack Distance.
50% of any damage dealt will be dealt as Pure Damage to the unit that was the target of this rendition.
The rendition stays for 2 action phases and disappears afterwards.

The unit that was the target of this rendition will emit a blast if this rendition is destroyed. This blast would deal 10 Melee Damage and slow all adjacent enemy units by 50% until the end of their next action.
This unit is slowed by 50% until the end of its next action.
